oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Faculty and administration photographic directory, Fall 1986
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Middle Tennessee State University, Photographic Services; Middle Tennessee State University, Publications and Graphics
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A directory of university faculty and administrator portraits for the fall semester of the 1986-87 school year.

Middle Tennessee State University Faculty and Administration Middle Tennessee State Normal School Faculty and Students 1911 PHOTOGRAPHIC DIRECTORY FALL 1986 ~ Diamond Anniversary + 1911- 1986 As part of the celebration of our 75th anniversary, this directory of faculty members and administrative personnel is provided by Photographic Services and Publications and Graphics with funds from the Office of Vice President for Academic Affairs and with the support and encouragement of the 1985- 86 Faculty Senate. Extensive efforts were made to obtain up- to- date photographs and to be accurate in the listings. Much appreciation goes to faculty members and administrators who graciously responded and cooperated. The personnel included reflect the best information available in late summer; however, changes occurring after that time will not be reflected. Plans are to produce an addendum of the new faculty members and administrative staff each fall. The inclusion of telephone and box numbers was requested by 1985- 86 Faculty Senate President Earl Hinton as a convenience for users. Publications and Graphics regrets any changes or inaccuracies which may have occurred in that information. Photographs are by Jack Ross and Mark Hay of Photographic Services. Compilation of information was coordinated by Diane Stewart; type and page design and layout were done by Mitzi Brandon; cover design was by Judy Hall, all of Publications and Graphics under the direction of Suma Clark. The directory was printed at the Print Shop, Tony Snook, director. MTSU is an equal opportunity, non- racially identifiable, educational institution which does not discriminate against the handicapped. Sam H. Ingram University President Cart; ext. 2622 Mitchell D.
